General.Name: Honmyue Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Honmyue Enterprise Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells fabrics and textiles under the nüwa and HONYI brands in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers nylon fabrics, polyester fabrics, polyester spun fabrics, vinyl mesh fabrics, TC/TR fabrics, yarn dyed fabrics, solution dyed fabrics, etc. Its products are used in industrial and baggage fabric, home and outdoor furnishing fabric, apparel and outdoor sports fabric, and medical textile applications. The company was founded in 1970 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.
